ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Logging functions in 'RcppSpdlog' provide access to the logging functionality from the 'spdlog' 'C++' library. This package offers shorter convenience wrappers for the 'R' functions which match the 'C++' functions, namely via, say, 'spdl::debug()' at the debug level. The actual formatting is done by the 'fmt::format()' function from the 'fmtlib' library (that is also 'std::format()' in 'C++20' or later).

Logging functions in 'RcppSpdlog' provide access to the logging functionality from the 'spdlog' 'C++' library. This package offers shorter convenience wrappers for the 'R' functions which match the 'C++' functions, namely via, say, 'spdl::debug()' at the debug level. The actual formatting is done by the 'fmt::format()' function from the 'fmtlib' library (that is also 'std::format()' in 'C++20' or later).

name: r-spdl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-spdl
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/spdl_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/spdl/spdl_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2d7a888eec3f582df61ba7a2dcf27cbf886dc3696cdf6e44c04c1da638fdb8a0

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcppspdlog >=0.0.10
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcppspdlog >=0.0.10

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('spdl')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('spdl')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/eddelbuettel/spdl
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Logging functions in 'RcppSpdlog' provide access to the logging functionality from the 'spdlog' 'C++' library. This package offers shorter convenience wrappers for the 'R' functions which match the 'C++' functions, namely via, say, 'spdl::debug()' at the debug level. The actual formatting is done by the 'fmt::format()'
    function from the 'fmtlib' library (that is also 'std::format()' in 'C++20' or later).
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - shelnutt2
    - eddelbuettel

# Package: spdl
# Type: Package
# Title: Wrapper for 'RcppSpdlog' Functions
# Description: Logging functions in 'RcppSpdlog' provide access to the logging functionality from the 'spdlog' 'C++' library. This package offers shorter convenience wrappers for the 'R' functions which match the 'C++' functions, namely via, say, 'spdl::debug()' at the debug level. The actual formatting is done by the 'fmt::format()' function from the 'fmtlib' library (that is also 'std::format()' in 'C++20' or later).

# Date: 2022-12-01
# Authors@R: person("Dirk", "Eddelbuettel", role = c("aut","cre"), email = "edd@debian.org")

# Imports: RcppSpdlog (>= 0.0.10)
